original_text: They replied, ‘Some people say that you are John the Baptist. Other people say that you are Elijah. And some other people say that you are one of God's prophets from long ago. They think that this prophet has become alive again.’
korean_text: 대답하여 이르되 세례 요한이라 하고 더러는 엘리야라, 더러는 옛 선지자 중의 한 사람이 살아났다 하나이다

sentences.original_text: Some people say that you are John the Baptist
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 당신이 세례 요한이라고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: Other people say that you are Elijah
that you are one of God's prophets from long ago
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 옛적의 하나님의 선지자 중 한 사람이라고

sentences.original_text: They think that this prophet has become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이 선지자가 다시 살아났다고 생각합니다
